title: Sweet and spicy chilli and tomato chutney
ingredients: ['2 slices pineapple, diced', '1.4kg tomatoes, peeled and diced', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '2 fresh chillies, finely chopped', '1 (4cm) piece fresh ginger, peeled and finely chopped', '1 dessertspoon cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '150g caster sugar', '200ml white wine vinegar', '400ml water']
